A new SSL session is created by each thread for every run.
body.h5: The Grinder's SSL implementation is not secure

p.em: WarningThe Grinder deliberately accelerates SSL initialisation by using a random number generator that is seeded with a fixed number. This does not hinder SSL communication, but theoretcially makes it less secure. No guarantee is made as to the cryptographical strength of any SSL communication using The Grinder.

body.p: This acceleration affects initialisation time only and should not affect timing information obtained using The Grinder.
